import { useContext } from 'react' import { DataContext } from '../store/GlobalState' import { deleteItem } from '../store/Actions' import { deleteData } from '../utils/fetchData' import {useRouter} from 'next/router' const Modal = () => { const {state, dispatch} = useContext(DataContext) const { modal, auth } = state const handleSubmit = () => { if(modal.type === 'ADD_USERS'){ deleteData(`user/${modal.id}`,auth.token).then (res=>{ if(res.err) return dispatch({type: 'NOTIFY', payload: {error: res.err}}) return dispatch({type: 'NOTIFY', payload: {success: res.msg}})}) } dispatch(deleteItem(modal.data,modal.id,modal.type)) dispatch({type:'ADD_MODAL',payload:{}}) } return(
Do you want to delete this item?
) } export default Modal
